DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate impact school-based Human Papillomavirus ( HPV ) vaccination program determine combination increase disease vaccine education couple removal barrier positively impact HPV vaccination uptake completion rate among student .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Impact School Based HPV Program Vaccination Uptake Completion Rates
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate impact school-based HPV vaccination program . The intervention consist : provision HPV vaccine information consent form parent deliver back-to-school packet ; school-nurse delivered student education ; removal barrier ( schedule , transportation parental presence ) ; change social norm ; provision free HPV vaccine .
DOC.criteria: Must complete three dose series HPV vaccine Must student Wayne County Monticello High School KY Completed three dose series Pregnant Contraindication vaccine ingredient
